title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository with CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama, providing sync/async clients and streaming support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers with fetch-based client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, enabling chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Maven Central distribution.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync clients and strong typing for Ollama API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat interface that proxies to Ollama with Markdown rendering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models via slash commands with per-guild config.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced terminal UI for Ollama with conversation persistence and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Streamlit-based web UI for Ollama with model selection and parameter tuning sliders.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama targeting JVM, Android, and iOS.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that threads Ollama responses with @mention triggers and rate limiting.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate with low-level bindings and tokio-based async client.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.
